Description: Moisturize your hair and scalp with Beyond Bold’s Oil Applicator. It keeps your hair silky and full of shine with its natural oil mixture. This natural hair care product leaves your hair softer and scalp relaxed after you massage it through. The sweet smell brings a meditative calmness to your hair regimen routine. How to Use Apply the oil directly to scalp after parting the hair. Continue this step until you are satisfied with your scalps moisture application.  You may warm up the Oil Applicator in a small copper bowl until it feels nice against your fingertips.
